original_text: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
korean_text: 민족이 민족을, 나라가 나라를 대적하여 일어나겠고 곳곳에 지진이 있으며 기근이 있으리니 이는 재난의 시작이니라

sentences.original_text: For nation shall rise against nation
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 민족이 민족을 대적하여 일어나 것이니

sentences.original_text: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places
and there shall be famines and troubles
these are the beginnings of sorrows
